item.title: My thoughts and experiences on the Pebble Smart Watch
item.description: LIke with a lot of things in life I told myself I didn't want one. And then when it came down to it I realized I was lying to myself and I actually did. This was the story behind the Pebble Smart Watch. Once people started getting them delivered, and I read this review I knew I must have it. Luckily Criagslist exists and people were selling theirs. Watch acquired.
